body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations       Official Videos & Multimedia of William Howard Taft National Historic Site     This page contains official park videos and multimedia created by park staff.  Please be sure to cite the park and the author listed if downloading and sharing these videos and multimedia.               William Howard Taft; Public Servant   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:16 minutes, 9 seconds  This is the official orientation film for William Howard Taft National Historic Site.  Digitally re-produced for the web.
title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
